results.name: a(n) = smallest nonzero number that is not a substring of n in ternary representation.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: a261787 x = f $ tail a030341_tabf where
then f css else foldr (\d v -> 3 * v + d) 0 cs
